8270.quoteText:
2.
When the service comes into contact with user data that shall not be logged, it is discarded as quickly as possible.
8270.title: User logs are deleted after a finite period of time

tosdr.case: User logs are deleted after a finite period of time

8271.quoteText:
If not specifically requested by the user, no data is logged.
Some features require some sort of data retention.
in that case, our users are given the option, control, and full access to what is logged and for how long
8271.title: Only necessary user logs are kept by the service to ensure quality

tosdr.case: Only necessary user logs are kept by the service to ensure quality
